data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) Of Premier Limited (The Company) For The Quarter Ended 31St December 2025.
data.news_body: This is in continuation to our intimation dated 03rd February 2026 u/r 29 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 regarding the declaration of results on 06th February 2026. The Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2025 were issued by M/s. Jayesh Dadia & Associates LLP the Statutory Auditors pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations. The said results thereon are attached herewith. As you are aware that the company is under CIRP in terms of the Order of Honble NCLT Mumbai Bench dated 29th January 2021. The powers of the Board of Directors are suspended and are vested in the undersigned Resolution Professional and Companys affairs business and assets are being managed by the undersigned Resolution Professional. The results were signed by Ms. Kanak Jani Resolution Professional of the company. The meeting commenced at 2:30 p.m. and concluded at 05:50 p.m.
